column4: Hi there! I'm trying out ubuntu on a spare laptop to give it a go... and I'm currently downloading some stuff through apt. I notice it's coming from nz.archive.ubuntu.com.. I'm wondering if there is a New Zealand mirror it's putting from?
well, I don't know if it really is in NZ
I'll look at my traffic logs I guess
thankfully I'm still on a flatrate plan, but traceroute shows it as not-NZ
